title: Units: Unit entities, AI state machines, combat system
description:
Player and enemy units, AI behaviors, and combat calculations.
Codemap: CODEMAP_UNITS.md
Exit criteria: All UC-UNITS-N acceptance criteria pass.

title: Bootstrap Units: Create task beads
description:
USE ULTRATHINK. Bead structure is high-leverage — errors cascade downstream.

Read docs/codemaps/CODEMAP_UNITS.md.
Create task beads from each UC-UNITS-N. Each task uses --parent mini-warriors-reborn-1l5.

TRANSLATION — For each UC-UNITS-N in the codemap:
- Title: UC ID + title (e.g., UC-UNITS-1: Create unit from pool)
- What: from the UC When clause
- Acceptance: from the UC Acceptance field
- Context: from the UC Given clause
- Depends: SPECIFIC UC-UNITS-N task IDs (NEVER an epic)

SIZING RULES — A bead is correctly sized when ALL are true:
- Single responsibility: ≤10 words without and
- Clear done: one shell command proves success
- Isolated: testable without other pending beads
- Single layer: touches only ONE of protocol/data/logic/UI/tests

If a UC fails sizing rules, decompose it into multiple beads.

Wire task dependencies using bd dep add --type blocks.

DONE WHEN: All UC-UNITS-N from CODEMAP_UNITS.md have task beads.

title: UC-UNITS-7: Wave spawning
description: When wave timer triggers, spawn enemies according to definition (count, interval).
design: Context: Wave definition with spawn groups. Touches: WaveManager.ts, EnemyUnit.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-1
acceptance_criteria: Wave 1 spawns 3 goblins with 2s spacing

title: UC-UNITS-8: Projectile creation and hit
description: When ranged unit attack reaches fire frame, spawn projectile that travels to target and deals damage.
design: Context: Ranged unit (Archer) attacks. Touches: Projectile.ts, CombatSystem.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-3
acceptance_criteria: Archer fires arrow, arrow travels, enemy takes damage

title: UC-UNITS-9: Apply upgrades to unit stats
description: When unit created, modify stats by upgrade multipliers from GameState.
design: Context: Unit with upgrades in GameState. Touches: PlayerUnit.ts, units.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-1
acceptance_criteria: Upgrade swordsman offense T1, spawn, verify damage > 10

title: UC-UNITS-10: Tank blocking behavior
description: When enemy reaches Knight's melee range, Knight enters holding state and blocks enemy advance.
design: Context: Knight (tank_unit behavior) engaging enemies. Touches: StateMachine.ts, Unit.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-2
acceptance_criteria: Knight stops goblin horde, enemies pile up behind

title: UC-UNITS-11: Flying unit movement
description: When flying unit moves toward target, ignore ground collision and move with sine wave pattern.
design: Context: Griffin or Dragon (flying_unit behavior). Touches: Unit.ts, StateMachine.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-2
acceptance_criteria: Observe Griffin bobbing while flying

title: UC-UNITS-12: Healer support behavior
description: When damaged ally nearby, healer targets lowest HP ally and heals instead of attacking.
design: Context: Healer (support_caster behavior) with damaged ally nearby. Touches: StateMachine.ts, CombatSystem.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-2
acceptance_criteria: Damaged swordsman near healer regains HP

title: UC-UNITS-13: Base takes damage
description: When attack lands on base, base HP decreases and damage state visual updates.
design: Context: Enemy reaches player base. Touches: Base.ts, CombatSystem.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-3
acceptance_criteria: Let enemy through, verify base HP decreases

title: UC-UNITS-14: Enemy gold drop
description: When enemy unit dies, award gold to player based on enemy definition.
design: Context: Enemy unit dies. Touches: EnemyUnit.ts, CombatSystem.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-4
acceptance_criteria: Kill goblin, verify +5 gold

title: UC-UNITS-15: AOE damage (Mage splash)
description: When mage deals primary damage, all enemies within 40px radius take 50% damage.
design: Context: Mage attacks enemy. Touches: CombatSystem.ts, Unit.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-3
acceptance_criteria: Mage attacks goblin cluster, multiple take damage

title: UC-UNITS-1: Create player unit
description: When createPlayerUnit(scene, 'swordsman', x, y) called, create PlayerUnit sprite with correct stats from definition.
design: Context: BattleScene active with unit definitions loaded. Touches: PlayerUnit.ts, units.ts
acceptance_criteria: Spawn swordsman, verify HP=50, damage=10

title: UC-UNITS-2: Unit AI state transitions
description: When enemy enters melee range, unit state transitions from moving to attacking.
design: Context: Unit with MeleeAggressor behavior. Touches: StateMachine.ts, Unit.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-1
acceptance_criteria: Observe swordsman stop walking and swing when enemy in range

title: UC-UNITS-3: Combat damage calculation
description: When attack animation completes, target takes damage and health bar updates.
design: Context: Attacker in attacking state, target in range. Touches: CombatSystem.ts, Unit.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-1
acceptance_criteria: Swordsman attacks goblin, goblin HP decreases by ~10

title: UC-UNITS-4: Unit death and cleanup
description: When unit HP <= 0, transition to dying state, play death animation, destroy unit.
design: Context: Unit with HP <= 0 after damage. Touches: Unit.ts, CombatSystem.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-3
acceptance_criteria: Kill enemy, verify death animation plays, sprite removed

title: UC-UNITS-5: Spawn unit from factory
description: When player triggers spawn input, create unit at spawn point and add to player units group.
design: Context: Player triggers spawn input. Touches: PlayerUnit.ts, BattleScene.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-1
acceptance_criteria: Spawn archer, verify appears at left side of battlefield

title: UC-UNITS-6: Pause freezes all units
description: When game paused, all unit state machines stop updating and animations pause.
design: Context: Multiple units in various states. Touches: Unit.ts, StateMachine.ts. Depends: UC-UNITS-2
acceptance_criteria: Pause mid-attack, verify attack animation frozen

title: UC-AUDIO-7: Handle audio unlock
description: Context: Browser requires user interaction for audio. When first user input, audio context unlocked and queued sounds play.
acceptance_criteria: First click plays any pending sounds

title: UC-AUDIO-8: Adjust volume from settings
description: Context: Player on settings menu. When volume slider moved, corresponding volume updates in real-time (clamped 0-1).
acceptance_criteria: Drag slider, hear volume change immediately

title: UC-AUDIO-9: Pool frequently-used sounds
description: Context: Rapid combat with many hits. When same SFX triggered repeatedly, pooled instances reused, no audio clipping.
acceptance_criteria: 10 rapid sword hits don't create audio chaos

title: UC-AUDIO-10: Scene-appropriate music
description: Context: Player navigates between scenes. When Scene.create() runs, appropriate music for that scene plays (menu, battle_easy/hard, boss, upgrade).
acceptance_criteria: Each scene has correct background music

title: UC-AUDIO-11: Wave start fanfare
description: Context: Battle in progress. When new wave begins, wave start sound plays.
acceptance_criteria: Wave 2 starts, hear distinctive sound

title: UC-AUDIO-12: Boss spawn announcement
description: Context: Boss enemy in wave. When boss spawns, dramatic boss spawn sound plays.
acceptance_criteria: Giant spawns in stage 10, hear ominous sound

title: UC-AUDIO-1: Initialize audio manager
description: Context: PreloadScene complete. When AudioManager instantiated, manager registered and audio unlock handler set.
acceptance_criteria: AudioManager.getInstance() returns instance after boot

title: UC-AUDIO-2: Play sound effect
description: Context: AudioManager initialized. When playSfx('sword_hit') called, random variation played with slight pitch variation.
acceptance_criteria: Sword hit plays with audible variation each time

title: UC-AUDIO-3: Play victory/defeat jingle
description: Context: Battle ends. When playMusic('victory') or ('defeat') called, current music stops and jingle plays once (no loop).
acceptance_criteria: Win battle, hear victory fanfare

title: UC-AUDIO-4: Purchase confirmation sound
description: Context: Player purchases upgrade. When playSfx('purchase_success') called, satisfying confirmation sound plays.
acceptance_criteria: Buy upgrade, hear coin/register sound

title: UC-AUDIO-5: Pause/resume audio
description: Context: Audio playing. When audioManager.pause() called, all sounds and music pause. Resume restores.
acceptance_criteria: Pause game, audio stops, resume restores

title: UC-AUDIO-6: Switch background music
description: Context: Music playing. When scene transition requires new music, current fades out and new fades in (crossfade).
acceptance_criteria: Enter battle, music crossfades from menu to battle

title: Integration: Cross-module flows
description:
Integration use cases from CODEMAP_OVERVIEW.md.
Tests module boundaries and end-to-end flows.
Exit criteria: All IUC-N acceptance criteria pass.

title: IUC-1: Game boot and asset loading
description:
## What
Initialize game via BootScene -> PreloadScene with all assets and AudioManager ready.

## Modules
Core -> Audio -> UI

## Acceptance
- [ ] `npm run dev && sleep 3 && curl -s http://localhost:5173 | grep -q game`

## Context
Fresh page load, tests game initialization flow.

## Depends
- UC-CORE-1, UC-AUDIO-1, UC-UI-1 task beads (wire after those are created)

title: IUC-2: Stage selection to battle start
description:
## What
Navigate from LevelSelectScene through LoadoutScene to BattleScene with correct config.

## Modules
Core -> Progression -> Units -> UI

## Acceptance
- [ ] Manual test: select stage 1, pick Swordsman, verify unit spawns in battle

## Context
Player on LevelSelectScene with unlocked stages.

## Depends
- UC-CORE-2, UC-PROG-1, UC-UNITS-1, UC-UI-2 task beads

title: IUC-3: Combat round with wave completion
description:
## What
Complete a wave: units fight, enemies die, gold awarded, wave counter updates.

## Modules
Units -> Progression -> Audio -> UI

## Acceptance
- [ ] Manual test: complete wave 1, verify gold increased and wave counter updated

## Context
BattleScene active with wave spawning enemies.

## Depends
- UC-UNITS-2, UC-UNITS-3, UC-PROG-2, UC-AUDIO-2, UC-UI-3 task beads

title: IUC-4: Battle victory with rewards
description:
## What
Win battle: stars calculated, rewards awarded, ResultsOverlay displayed.

## Modules
Units -> Progression -> Audio -> UI

## Acceptance
- [ ] Manual test: destroy enemy base, verify victory screen shows correct stars

## Context
Final wave defeated, enemy base HP at 0.

## Depends
- UC-UNITS-4, UC-PROG-3, UC-AUDIO-3, UC-UI-4 task beads

title: IUC-5: Unit spawning with cooldown
description:
## What
Spawn unit: gold deducted, unit created, cooldown starts, SFX plays, UI updates.

## Modules
Core -> Progression -> Units -> UI -> Audio

## Acceptance
- [ ] Manual test: spawn Swordsman, verify gold decreases and button shows cooldown

## Context
Player has gold, unit not on cooldown.

## Depends
- UC-CORE-3, UC-PROG-4, UC-UNITS-5, UC-UI-5, UC-AUDIO-2 task beads

title: IUC-6: Upgrade purchase flow
description:
## What
Purchase upgrade: gold deducted, upgrade applied, UI updated, progress saved.

## Modules
Progression -> UI -> Audio

## Acceptance
- [ ] Manual test: buy Swordsman T1 offense, verify damage increased in next battle

## Context
Player on UpgradeScene with enough gold.

## Depends
- UC-PROG-5, UC-UI-6, UC-AUDIO-4 task beads

title: IUC-7: Save/load cycle
description:
## What
Save progress, refresh page, restore all progress from localStorage.

## Modules
Core -> Progression

## Acceptance
- [ ] `localStorage.getItem("miniWarriorsSave") && echo "save exists"`

## Context
Player has progress (stages cleared, upgrades purchased).

## Depends
- UC-CORE-4, UC-PROG-6 task beads

title: IUC-8: Pause and resume battle
description:
## What
Pause battle: game frozen, PauseOverlay shown, audio paused, units stopped.

## Modules
Core -> Units -> UI -> Audio

## Acceptance
- [ ] Manual test: pause mid-battle, verify units stop moving

## Context
Battle in progress.

## Depends
- UC-CORE-5, UC-UNITS-6, UC-UI-7, UC-AUDIO-5 task beads

title: Wire cross-module dependencies
description:
Review task beads across all modules.
Add blocks dependencies where:
- One task output is needed by another task
- IUC-N needs capabilities from specific UC-{M}-N tasks

Wire IUC beads to depend on their required UC task beads.
Run bv --robot-plan. Verify execution order is sensible.

DONE WHEN: Full dependency graph is correct.
